catalogInfo.productTitle: Decision Optimization Center on IBM Cloud
catalogInfo.handsOnLabSectionDescription:
Our interactive Labs provide a pre-configured environment and step-by-step guide to assist you in gaining familiarity with the IBM Cloud Services. Deleting the environment using the Trash will delete the environment for all (if more than one) Labs on IBM Cloud 4.3 labs. IBM Open Labs is best experienced with Firefox and Chrome browsers.

Note: These labs can accomodate 30 concurrent users. If you are planning a workshop with a large number of users, open an issue via the Help menu. Please provide contact information, desired date of workshop (minimum of 1 week notice required), and number of attendees.
catalogInfo.videoSectionDescription: Watch technical experts walk you through common use cases, highlighting product features and key capabilities.
